mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id AS userId, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_email AS userEmail, u.user_telno AS userTelno, u.user_imgpath AS userImgpath, u.user_jncmp_ymd AS userJncmpYmd, c1.code_nm AS userDeptName, -- 부서명 c2.code_nm AS userJobName -- 직무명 FROM tb_user u LEFT JOIN tb_code c1 ON u.user_dept_cd_code_cl = c1.code_cl AND c1.code_no = u.user_dept_cd LEFT JOIN tb_code c2 ON u.user_jbps_ty_cd_code_cl = c2.code_cl AND c2.code_no = u.user_jbps_ty_cd WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT inq_title AS inqTitle, inq_create_at AS inqCreateAt FROM t_inquire WHERE user_id = #{userId};

SELECT DISTINCT ON (cust.cust_id) cust.cust_nm AS custNm, cust.cust_email AS custEmail, d.dsgn_ds_ty_cd AS dsgnDsTyCd, d.dsgn_ds_ty_cd_code_cl AS dsgnDsTyCdCodeCl, d.dsgn_prg_stcd AS dsgnPrgStcd, d.dsgn_prg_stcd_code_cl AS dsgnPrgStcdCodeCl, c.code_nm AS dsgnDsTyCdName -- tb_code의 code_nm 추가 FROM tb_custprod_dsgn d LEFT JOIN tb_customer cust ON cust.user_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_code c -- 테이블 이름을 tb_code로 변경 ON c.code_cl = d.dsgn_ds_ty_cd_code_cl -- 조인 조건 AND c.code_no = d.dsgn_ds_ty_cd WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cust.cust_id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET user_name = #{userName}, user_telno = #{userTelno}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_imgpath = #{userImgpath}, user_dept_cd_code_cl = ( SELECT code_cl FROM tb_code WHERE code_nm = #{userDeptName} LIMIT 1 ), user_jbps_ty_cd_code_cl = ( SELECT code_cl FROM tb_code WHERE code_nm = #{userJobName} LIMIT 1 ) WHERE user_id = #{userId}
